ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Atmospheric molecule monitoring observation by infrared spectrometry at Rikubetsu, Japan
ResourceHeader.Description: Atmospheric molecule monitoring data obtained by the high-resolution Fourier transform infra-red spectrometer at Rikubetsu, Japan
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The data are available only for scientific research use. Please contact the Principal Investigator (Tomoo Nagahama) for the details.

AccessURL.Name: Website of Mizuno group, Atmospheric Environment Division
AccessURL.Description: Mizuno Group, Atmospheric Environment Division, Institute for Space-Earth Environmental Research, Nagoya University

Parameter.Name: O3 volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric O3 (ozone)

Parameter.Name: HCl volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric HCl molecule

Parameter.Name: ClONO2 volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric ClONO2 molecule

Parameter.Name: HNO3 volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric HNO3 molecule

Parameter.Name: HF volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric HF molecule

Parameter.Name: CO2 volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric CO2 molecule, being measured since 2009

Parameter.Name: CH4 volume mixing ratio
Parameter.Description: Column-averaged volume mixing ratio of atmospheric CH4 molecule (Metane), being measured since 2009
